name: Stellar Defense
description:
In this game you are tasked with defending the galaxy from UFO attacks. 
Rockets are shot at the sun, to destroy it! 
With this the entire orbit system of the galaxy will collapse!

Play with the Cursor to hover or click the rockets to destroy them.
Move around with WASD, Shift and Space to get a better perspective
Use C to take on the perspective of the Alien Mothership
